name: Prison Dream
description:
====== Title ======

 Prison Dream

 ====== Story ======

When you woke up, you was in a dilapidated building.

 Will you be able to solve the various tricks and escape from the creepy facility?

 ==== How to play ====

 Select : Left click

Camera Zoom : Mouse wheel
